name: Jago International Pte. Ltd.
description: Jago International Pte. Ltd. is the Singapore-incorporated holding company. The group operates its Jago Coffee business in Indonesia through its wholly-owned subsidiary, PT SATUAN TEKNOLOGI BERJALAN.
one_liner: Jago International Pte. Ltd. is the Singapore-incorporated holding company. The group operates its Jago Coffee business in Indonesia through its wholly-owned subsidiary, PT SATUAN TEKNOLOGI BERJALAN.
